mapper.select: select order_id AS orderId, spot_name AS orderSpotname, order_total AS orderTotal, order_status AS orderStatus, order_createtime AS orderCreatetime, order_usetime AS orderUsetime, t_order.spot_id AS spotId from t_order, t_spot WHERE t_order.spot_id = t_spot.spot_id and t_order.user_id = #{id} and t_order.order_status like "%${type}%" and t_order.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_order (order_usetime, order_total, order_status, order_contact, spot_id, user_id) values (#{orderUsetime}, #{orderTotal}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderContact}, #{spotId}, #{userId})
